EmailTemplate.description: The record Stage has been changed
EmailTemplate.name: TKD_GenericmanualChangeStage
EmailTemplate.subject: Takedown "{!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name}" has been rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
You are receiving this notification because the Takedown CP {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name} stage has been changed to {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.TKD_ls_takedown_stage__c} by: {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.LastModifiedBy}
If you want to see the record in Salesforce, click here .
Regards, Engenium Capital.
